extendedInfo.description: Wallpapers Ultimate gives you access to all the wallpapers you need for your AndroidÂ® device. Wallpapers from over 50 different categories! Give your device a new look, like you are using a new theme.Every wallpaper can be edited to fit or fill the screen, or you can crop to a part of the image and set that as your wallpaper. And of course you can save wallpapers in your favorites list for fast access.All the wallpapers are in HD (high definition) quality and can be used for every screen resolution, even large tablets!Some of the categories you can select a wallpaper from: Abstract, Animals, Canada, Cars, China, Chinese Items, Christmas, Cities at night, Cosmos, Crop Circles, Cute Cats, Dark, Digital Universe, Dogs, Easter Day, Egypt, Expo Shanghai, Flowers, Fractal art, France, Guitars, Halloween, Hot and Cool, Independence Day, Interior Design, Japan, Man-Made, Military, Mixed, Moto Bikes, Mountains, NASA, Nature, Neon, New Year, New Zealand, Planets, Psychedelic, Romantic, Ships and Planes, Spain, Sunsets, Tanks, Thailand, Valentine Day, Waterscapes, Wine, WinterFeatures:- Save the wallpaper (pick a location or save to your pictures folder)- Let the wallpaper fit or fill your home screen- Crop to a specific part of the wallpaper- Add or remove favorite wallpapers for fast access- Of course set as backgroundWill it cost me any money?No, you can download the application for free. After that you will have unlimited access to all the wallpapers.**If we accidentally have your wallpaper included without your permission, contact us and we will remove it**Visit us on: http://www.icecoldapps.com/Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/IceColdAppsLike us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/IceColdAppsKeywords:Wallpaper, wallpapers, homescreen, home-screen, home screen, theme, themes, them, layout, background, back ground, photo, photos, quality, high quality, photography, photo graph, photograph, backgrounds, image, images, beautiful, cover, covers, cool, wall paper, wall papers, paper, snapshot, snap shot, print, capture, captured, snap, shot, shoot, snaps, shots, sdcard, sd card, external memory, memory stick, memorystick, new yearâs eve, new yearâs day, valentineâs day, usa independence day, romance, free, cheap, wallpapers HD, Cool wallpapers HD

reviews.title: At last.....
reviews.comment: At last an app that seems to handle the mystery that is Android and Wallpaper resolution. Have only tried 2 wallpapers so far and both fit my 10.1 screen perfectly without looking like they have been stretched and magnified. Well done and I think the choice of wallpapers is more than enough...
